segments.text: I see the girl standing there, her hand outstretched like she’s begging for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she’s been waiting for this moment all day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever been caught before, or if she’s always this lucky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is risking everything for her, and she’s just standing there like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she trusts him completely, even though he’s about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t tell if she’s brave or just completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes is so close, but she’s completely clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, but I also hope they don’t get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole thing is making me nervous just watching it.
segments.speaker: PAR
